metadata.name: Short Description
metadata.value: As a Human Resources Business Partner, you'll work within our Human Resources department to serve as a front-line HR lead for designated areas of our business. You'll manage a world-class onboarding experience and be a key resource for internal and external stakeholders regarding benefits and perks at Poatek. You'll collaborate with the HR and Employee Experience team to foster an environment where everyone at Poatek can thrive.

title: Senior Human Resources Business Partner & Operations, LATAM (Poatek- Brazil applicants)
content:
Senior Human Resources Business Partner & Operations, LATAM
Who We Are
In 2021, Poatek was acquired by WillowTree, an award-winning digital product consultancy recognized as one of the fastest growing and best places to work in the United States. Now a TELUS International company, with offices across the globe, we continue to partner with the world’s leading brands, such as Capital One, HBO, PepsiCo, Domino’s and more, to design, build, and transform their digital products and strategies. We’re looking to grow our Poatek offices in Brazil with top talent excited to collaborate with team members across the globe to deliver innovative solutions for our clients.
Location & Flexibility
Our Senior Human Resources Business Partners are integral parts of our team at Poatek. To help retain our deep culture of collaboration, this role will maintain an in-office presence in a hybrid capacity in our São Paulo office. 
The Opportunity
As a Senior Human Resources Business Partner & Operations, you'll be a strategic partner to executives in designated areas of our business. You'll provide coaching and subject matter expertise to executives and managers to drive performance improvements and successful outcomes of personnel challenges. You'll be a key resource for internal team members regarding performance development and career growth. You'll collaborate with the HR Operations team to cultivate an environment where everyone at Poatek and WillowTree can thrive.
Business Partnership Responsibilities 

Educate the business as well as key partners and stakeholders on relevant labor laws, labor regulations, and labor unions as well as international regulations and industry standards such as SOX compliance. 
Update policies, processes, and practices to ensure compliance with labor regulations and alignment to best practices for compensation and benefits in our sector within Brazil
Inform and educate on diversity, equity and inclusion concerns and considerations with an emphasis on the Brazil landscape, cross-cultural communications, and navigating the complexities of global identities.  
Manage or direct payroll for an organization of xx+ employees.  
Lead HR-related change management efforts related to mergers and acquisitions, restructures, or cultural transformations. 
Select, manage, and update benefits in keeping with the local landscape, culture, and industry standards. 
Manage HR analytics (including identification, creation, and updating) to advise the organization to act on significant trends. 
Manage a team including coaching and development of talent.

Qualifications

8+ years of experience with many different aspects of Human Resources - from performance management and employment law to employee relations and benefits administration
Proven experience assessing and maintaining labor regulation compliance.  Thorough understanding of labor contracts and BZ compensation practices, proven experience managing compliance within these areas.  (Ideal candidate for me would have legal educational background- pivoting to HR)
Understanding of local best practices surrounding Diversity/Equity/Inclusion and experience revising or creating programs and policies to further locally appropriate Diversity/Equity/Inclusion initiatives.
Thorough understanding of Brazilian employment tax system and experience managing or directing payroll for an organization of 500 + employees
Understanding of international regulations, industry standards, and laws applicable to our current atmosphere:  SOX Compliance; GDPR: ISO
Expert- level proficiency in business tools including Smartsheet, Excel, Google Sheets, Google Data Studio (bonus points for Looker experience)
Experience and high level proficiency working with Workday HRIS; Convenia ERP, and ability to quickly learn and adapt to new tooling. (Dream candidate would understand the basics of coding as it applies to things like Excel/Google Data Studio; Would also have experience managing a migration to Workday.
English language verbal and written fluency 

Bonus Points

Experience as an HRBP or HR Generalist supporting a large global team, specifically with offices in the U.S., Canada, South America, and Europe
Experience as an HR professional in a consultancy or agency in the creative or tech industry
Experience managing relationship with labor unions
Deep understanding of our industry- ideally experience with both fast-growing firm and larger competitors.

Why Poatek?
What We Offer:

Be part of an innovative consultancy with a human-centered and culture with opportunities for ownership and professional growth
Competitive salary and benefits package (annual bonus)
Opportunity to work on innovative agile projects with other high-performing, passionate team members from all over the globe (international travel opportunities)
Collaborative work environment that encourages continuous learning and professional development (including English classes, support in national and international courses,
Flexible work hours and autonomy
Voucher for health activities, food allowance, in-office snacks, drinks, and games

If you love IT as much as we do, we look forward to meeting you!

Equality is a principle here at Poatek. We are committed to building an inclusive team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, beliefs, and experiences. Therefore we provide equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants regardless of race, color, religion, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, age, or disability.
We will only use the information you provide to process your application and to produce tracking statistics. Since we do not request personal data deemed sensitive, we ask you to abstain from sharing that information with us.
For more information on how we use your information, see our Privacy Policy.
